title: Quechua Huanuco (2009) New Testament
description: Huánuco is a department and region in central Peru. It is bordered by the La Libertad, San Martín, Loreto, and Ucayali regions in the north, the Ucayali Region in the east, the Pasco Region in the south, and the Lima and Ancash regions in the west. Its capital is the city of Huánuco.
